short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pwdhash-PoC 1.0 for Chrome. Automatically generates per-site passwords if you prefix your password with @@ or F2.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses the updated PwdHash-PoC (https://cybot.github.io/) which adresses weaknesses in the original version of PwdHash.
